temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.content:
• Optimal growth at 37 째C.
  • Susceptible to moist heat: physical inactivation at 121 째C for 15 min and dry heat: 160-170 째C for at least 1 hour.
  • Tolerant of cold temperatures, Francisella tularensis can survive for weeks at low temperatures across various substrates, including water, soil, forage, grain dust, and decaying organic matter such as carcasses and hides.
  • Infected rabbit meat stored frozen at -15째 C has remained infective for longer than 3 years.

oxygen.title: Oxygen
oxygen.content: Francisella tularensis is an aerobe bacterium with optimal growth occurring in ambient air or in an environment with 5% CO2
